channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Footpath trip hazard, 4th July
item.description:
Loose/moving flagstone o/s #30 Bowness Road. Serious risk of tripping over.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bowness Road, Catford South, London

item.title: Rubbish dumped on pavement, 4th July
item.description:
Rubbish is dumped on the pavement at the end of clonbrock road on an almost daily basis

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Nevill Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked across our driveway, 4th July
item.description:
Grey ford registration LT07 ZSR parked across our driveway last night at around 10.30 by our door bell camera. When we got home last night could not get our car in driveway as car was illegally parked across it. Car was still there this morning when we got up. When we came back fro work car still there. We have checked it is tax and mot until October 2025. The car is open when we tried the door and there is no petrol cap on the car. As we can't get into our driveway to park the safe over night which our insurance thinks we do, we would not be able to claim if the our car was hit over night. We have informed the police and they can't do anything and has told us to get intouch with you. Can this vehicle be moved please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Palmeira Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cleaners not cleaning, 4th July
item.description:

item.title: Bin blocking path, 4th July
item.description:
This bin is left out 24/7 despite room in driveway, it is very close to primary school and parents with prams or walking children are forced onto the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wessex Way, Brent Cross, London

item.title: Fly tipping and council bins, 4th July
item.description:
Ongoing fly tipping in the area. Council bins placed on pavement by Bethal corner shop. Bins attracting pests and fly tipping behaviour. Please remove bins to behind the building
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harrow Manorway, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Scaffolding, 4th July
item.description:
Scaffolding has been placed on external property for 2 years. no works going on. this is limiting the right to light for neighbouring property. this is a cause for concern and needs removing or works finishing. the landlord is sanctuary housing.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Victoria Park Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cycle lane into Barker Drive from Camley street, 4th July
item.description:
Car restriction bollard has been removed allowing cars to drive from St Pancras Way into Camley Street via Barker Drive. The cycle lanes are only wide enough for one car and the situation is dangerous. Bollard needs replacing and locking.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barker Drive, Kentish Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown weed, 4th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 146-148, Felixstowe Road, Abbey Wood, London
